text:
I can't believe this is not real. 

This video is 100% AI-made. Here's how:

1. Gemini’s Nano Banana → Make the base images.
2. Seedance → Turn images into short motion clips.
3. Kling → Add realism and camera moves.
4. Seedance → Stitch clips, smooth cuts and timing.
5. Nano Banana → Add titles, poster frame, export.

Credit: "You've seen these paintings a million times" from @maxescu on IG, a must for AI lovers.

If you want more of these, repost ♻️ this video.

And I will create a step-by-step guide on the "how".
